name: ApplicationProperties

methods.name: containsProperty
methods.documentation: Returns {@code true} if a property with the given name exists.

methods.name: decryptValue
methods.documentation:
Decrypts the given encrypted value using the configured {@link Encryption} strategy.

Returns the original value if decryption is not applicable.

methods.name: encryptValue
methods.documentation: Encrypts the given value using the configured {@link Encryption} strategy.

methods.name: getBooleanProperty
methods.documentation:
Resolves a boolean property by key, returning {@code false} if not present.

Accepts case-insensitive "true" as {@code true}, otherwise returns {@code false}.

methods.name: getBooleanProperty
methods.documentation: Resolves a boolean property by key, returning a default if the property is not present.

methods.name: getEncryption
methods.documentation:
Returns the currently active {@link Encryption} instance.

By default, wraps the encryption from the current {@link PropertySource}.

methods.name: getFirstAvailableProperty
methods.documentation:
Returns an {@link Optional} containing the first non-null property value
 among the provided property names, if any exist. If no properties are resolved,
 returns an empty {@link Optional}.

methods.name: getIntegerProperty
methods.documentation:
Resolves an integer property by key, or {@code null} if not found.

 @throws NumberFormatException if the property value is not a valid integer

methods.name: getIntegerProperty
methods.documentation:
Resolves an integer property by key, or returns the given default value if not found.

 @throws NumberFormatException if the property value is not a valid integer

methods.name: getLongProperty
methods.documentation:
Resolves a long property by key, or {@code null} if not found.

 @throws NumberFormatException if the property value is not a valid long

methods.name: getLongProperty
methods.documentation:
Resolves a long property by key, or returns the given default value if not found.

 @throws NumberFormatException if the property value is not a valid long

methods.name: getProperty
methods.documentation: Returns the raw string property for the given key, or {@code null} if not found.

methods.name: getProperty
methods.documentation: Returns the string property value for the given key, or the specified default if not found.

methods.name: mapProperty
methods.documentation:
Maps a property value identified by its name to a desired type using the provided mapping function.
 If the property is not available, the method returns {@code null}.

methods.name: mapProperty
methods.documentation:
Maps a property value identified by its name to a desired type using the provided mapping function.
 If the property is not found, the method returns a default value supplied by the given supplier.

methods.name: requireProperty
methods.documentation: Returns the string property for the given key, throwing an {@link IllegalStateException} if not found.

methods.name: substituteProperties
methods.documentation:
Substitutes placeholders in the given template using current property values.

Placeholders use the syntax {@code ${propertyName}}.

methods.name: substituteProperties
methods.documentation:
Substitutes placeholders in the properties using current property values.

Placeholders use the syntax {@code ${propertyName}}.
